item.title: CVE-2023-3743|2023-07-18T11:56:05.572Z -- leotheme -- ap%20page%20builder
item.description: Ap Page Builder, in versions lower than 1.7.8.2, could allow a remote attacker to send a specially crafted SQL query to the product_one_img parameter to retrieve the information stored in the database.
